mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY C.CARTNO DESC), C.CARTNO, C.CAMOUNT, C.STARTDATE, C.ENDDATE, C.MEMNO, C.PNO, C.STATENO, P.PAMOUNT, P.PPRICE, P.PNAME, P.PFILE FROM CART C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PNO = P.PNO WHERE C.STATENO = 1

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY C.CARTNO DESC), C.CARTNO, C.CAMOUNT, C.STARTDATE, C.ENDDATE, C.MEMNO, C.PNO, C.STATENO, P.PAMOUNT, P.PPRICE, P.PNAME, P.PFILE FROM CART C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PNO = P.PNO

SELECT TO_DATE(ENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(STARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM CART WHERE CARTNO IN
#{cartListDto.cartNo}
SELECT COUNT(PNAME)-1 FROM CART C INNER JOIN PAY P ON (C.CARTNO = P.CARTNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT PR ON (C.PNO = PR.PNO) WHERE PAYNO = #{payNo}
SELECT PNAME FROM CART C INNER JOIN PAY P ON (C.CARTNO = P.CARTNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT PR ON (C.PNO = PR.PNO) WHERE PAYNO = #{payNo} AND P.CARTNO = #{cartNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, C.* FROM (SELECT * FROM CART JOIN PRODUCT ON CART.PNO = PRODUCT.PNO WHERE PRODUCT.PNAME LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' ORDER BY CARTNO DESC) C) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 + (#{page} -1) * 10 AND #{page} * 10
SELECT COUNT(CARTNO) COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, C.* FROM (SELECT * FROM CART JOIN PRODUCT ON CART.PNO = PRODUCT.PNO WHERE PRODUCT.PNAME LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' ORDER BY CARTNO DESC) C)
